about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - Crimson Crow.

- Featuring 30 songs from the PC version of the game.
- KAZING and several other composers contribute to this soundtrack.
- Files are available in 320kbps MP3 format, as well as FLAC format. (1 files are available in 320kbps MP3 format only.)

All the profit from this product will be used to enrich TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children. We'll do our best to give more pleasure.
